attributes.action: remove all taxes and replace them with expenditure tax (part of VAT)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: A large percentage of the taxes collected is spent to collect and regulate them. If all the taxes were removed and a single expenditure tax was introduces then a lot of legal issues will be reduces. VAT can be as high as 100% but then people will pay much less as they will not be paying any other tax such as income, corporate, inheritance, council, road, etc
